name: base-gear-ubuntu
label: Flywheel Ubuntu Base Gear
description: This Base Gear provides the user a gear structure to build a gear upon this base. This Base Gear has Ubuntu 14.04 as the environment. It also contains a run script that takes a zip archive file of DICOM files as input and creates a text file as the output.
author: Flywheel <support@flywheel.io>
